theCatGirl:AdventurerTag.NAME: Adventurer's Tag
theCatGirl:AdventurerTag.FLAVOR: A tag with your name made with a fantastical metal.

theCatGirl:BeginnersLuck.NAME: Beginner's Luck
DESCRIPTIONS: stacks. NL Whenever you discard a card, lose one stack and draw a card.

theCatGirl:DriedFish.NAME: Dried Fish
theCatGirl:DriedFish.FLAVOR: The perfect snack for a long adventure.

theCatGirl:Instincts.NAME: Instincts
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #rTrained. At the start of combat, gain #b
#yStrength at the end of your first turn.

theCatGirl:MonsterGuide.NAME: Monster Guide
theCatGirl:MonsterGuide.FLAVOR: Contains detailed information about every monster.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you would gain a #ydebuff in each combat, reflect it.

theCatGirl:NepetasHat.NAME: Nepeta's Hat
theCatGirl:NepetasHat.FLAVOR: It smells like sugar and tea...
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you attack an enemy that has #yBlock, remove #b2 of their #yBlock and apply #b2 #yPoison.

theCatGirl:ThrowingDagger.NAME: Throwing Dagger
theCatGirl:ThrowingDagger.FLAVOR: Any seasoned adventurer knows a trick or two.

theCatGirl:TrainedRelic.NAME: Trained
theCatGirl:TrainedRelic.FLAVOR: An adventurer is always able to exploit opportunities.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you attack an enemy that intends to attack, gain #b1 #yEvade.

theCatGirl:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain +1 Strength.

theCatGirl:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
theCatGirl:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.
